events.4.description: Gameday Remix, a Remix-based Scavenger Hunt
events.mixingItUp: MIXING IT UP WITH THE COMMUNITY
events.text: The Remix Project team gives workshops about Remix, as well as more general introductions to the Ethereum ecosystem and its associated use cases. We can tailor our presentations to the technical knowledge and skill level of your particular group, and we try to give entertaining talks. Reach out to us by email, or chat with us on one of our Gitter channels or Twitter.
